segments.text: What an irresponsible adult, not even checking the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out, wasting everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, and she doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are thieves, stealing cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that flimsy stool, endangering himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't they behave for once?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, reaching for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor will be slippery and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That garden outside mocks the disaster inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, and she's polishing one slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is what happens when no one pays attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn around, woman, before it's too late!
segments.speaker: PAR
